title: #239: Another Franklin Scandal | Nick Bryant
description:
The author of the transformational book “The Franklin Scandal” stops by to draw some similarities to what he discovered with the sexual blackmail operation that was running in the 1980s through Omaha, Nebraska to Washington DC, and the Jeffrey Epstein & Ghislaine Maxwell child trafficking ring that came to light in recent years.

Sexual entrapment has always been a devious and powerful tool used to control those who might think about blowing the whistle on how the power brokers in government really operate, but the scope and duration of these operations is truly staggering.

Nick Bryant literally wrote the book on how child sexual exploitation is weaponized by powerful intelligence agencies as a tool to keep captured politicians in line, and used to ruin someone if they stray too far off the reservation.
